FAQ / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Battle Cards /
View On Teletraan1.net

Dogfight

  1. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What happens if I play this with a Melee character on my team, but no Seekers?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    You scrap an enemy Weapon, but move no damage.
  2. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What happens if I play this with a Seeker character on my team, but no Melee characters?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    You move 1 damage from each of your Seekers to an enemy (scales for each character), but you would not scrap an enemy Weapon.
  3. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Do I get both effects if I have characters with both traits on my team?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Yes; this card doesnâ€™t ask you to choose.
